original: intros Hcohs1 Hcohs2 Hrel. apply rely_ext in Hrel as [i' [j' [Heqrely [HcohV i']]]]. rewrite Heqrely. rewrite -> HcohV in Hrel. apply rely_coh in Hrel as [HcohVi' Hcohs2]. apply Injection.Inject in w as [E [_ _ _ CohV _]]. destruct (CohV _ Hcohs2) as [s11 [s22 [Hse2 [HcohV11 HcohE22]]]]. rewrite Hse2 in HcohVi'. destruct (coh_split W2 (s11 \+ s1')) as [s11w [s11' [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. -- rewrite Hse2 in Hcohs2. apply cohUnKR in Hcohs2; try auto. destruct Hcohs2 as [_ _ H]. apply H. -- rewrite Hse2 in HcohVi'. apply HcohVi'. -- rewrite <- Heqrely in Hrel. rewrite Hse2 in Hrel. apply rely_trans with (s2 := s11 \+ s22); try auto. apply rely_coh in Hrel as [Hrel1 Hrel2]. apply sem_split in Hrel2 as [HstepV | HstepW]; try auto. ++ destruct HstepV as [Hstep Heq]. rewrite Heq in *. apply rely_split' with (s1' := s2') in Hstep; try auto. destruct Hstep as [Hstep1 _]. split. - eexists. eauto. - eexists. eauto. ++ destruct HstepW as [HstepW Heq]. rewrite <- Heq in *. apply rely_split' with (s1' := s1') in Hrel; try auto. destruct Hrel as [_ Hstep2]. split. - eexists. eauto. - eexists. eauto.
